#summary Community support for BigBlueButton

= Mailing Lists=

Need help?  If you don't find an answer in the links below 

  * ReleaseNotes
  * FrequentlyAskedQuestions
  * RoadMap

then post a message to one of the following groups:

  * For setup questions post to [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-setup/topics?gvc=2 bigbluebutton-setup]
  * For end-user questions post to [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-users/topics?gvc=2 bigbluebutton-users]
  * For all other questions post to [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/topics?gvc=2 bigbluebutton-dev]

There are many users on these groups that have become very familiar with !BigBlueButton and can help you get the most from this open source project.

= Commercial Support =
There is a growing list of [http://bigbluebutton.org/support companies that can provide you with commercial support for !BigBlueButton].
